version_description:
1. Enhanced the  performance for TS-119
2. Fixed some crash issues
3. Enhanced usability

1. Added support for share links
2. Added support for on-the-fly transcoding
3. Added a mini-player
4. Improved system stability
Improved system stability
Improved system stability
Fixed connection issue.

1. The UI design has been enhanced.
2. Automatic photo uploading is now supported (with Qfile 2.4.0).
3. Added support for using the default log-in mode (with Photo Station 5.2.0).
4. Using gestures for multiple selection is now supported.
Fixed the zoom function of the media viewer.
Fixed bug.

[New Features]
1.Added support for logging with myQNAPcloud ID (QID).
2.Qphoto now verifies certificates when users connect with SSL encryption.
3.Added guidance for installing and starting Photo Station.
4.Files in the local album can now be viewed and used.

[Enhancements]
1.Improved upload tasks in the background.
2.Users can now choose destinations when uploading photos.

[Fixes]
1.Users can now log in to the NAS successfully.

[New Features]
- Added support for uploading taken photos and recorded videos to the NAS directly.

[Enhancements]
- The minimum image size requirement for uploaded photos is consistent with the settings in Control Panel on QTS.

[Fixes]
- Some minor issues.

[New Features]
- Added support for instantly uploading recorded videos to the NAS in 4K resolution (the mobile device used must support 4K video recording)

[Enhancements]
- Added a Quick Start for the photo/video instant upload feature

[Fixes]
-Some minor issues.

[New Features]
- Added support for viewing images in the 360° Panorama mode and the Slideshow mode on the My Phone page.
- Added support for using a selfie stick to take photos and record videos.

[Enhancements]
- Photo/video instant upload now supports CloudLink.
- Improved the performance and the usability of photo/video instant upload.

[New Features]
Qphoto now automatically converts images from HEIF to JPG when uploading photos from iOS 11 devices.
Added the “Pause” and “Always Keep Recording” options for Video Instant Upload.
Added support for viewing images on the NAS in the 360° Panorama mode.

[Fixed Issues]
Images would be abnormally enlarged when double-clicked.

[Fixed Issues]
- Domain users were unable to create sharing links.

[New Features]
-Added photo and video sharing support for third-party applications
-Added video playback support for the default iOS player

[Enhancements]
-Now compatible with iPhone X
-Added random mode in Slideshow

[Fixed Issues]
Users sometimes could not automatically log on to the NAS via CloudLink.

[Fixed Issues]
- Unable to use iOS native player when accessing Qphoto by SSL.
- Unable to view videos in Panorama mode when accessing Qphoto by SSL.

[New Features]
- Added support for burst and time-lapse modes when using photo/video instant upload. (This feature requires Photo Station 5.7.0 or above.)

[New Features]
-Added support for viewing Live Photos on My Phone.
-Added support for uploading converted Live Photos to your NAS.
-Added support for browsing photos in original resolution.

[Enhancements]
-Added support for tagging multiple files at once.
-Added Region settings.
-Compatible with iOS 9.0 or later.

[Fixed Issues]
- Fixed some minor issues.

[New Features]
- Added support for multi-zone streaming.

[Enhancements]
- Optimized the time lapse function to improve user experience.
- Optimized the user interface to make Qphoto easier to use

[Fixed Issues]
- Fixed some minor issues.

[New Features]
- Added support for the new QNAP ID.

[Enhancements]
- Optimized the app icon.
- Improved the user experience for streaming.
- Improved connection quality based on region settings.

[Fixed Issues]
- Fixed a connection issue.

[Enhancements]
- Improved video streaming and photo viewing.
- Enhanced file downloading.
- Enhanced search criteria settings.
- Enhanced album sharing feature.

[Enhancements]
Improved translation for multiple languages.

[Fixed Issues]
Fixed app crashing issue.

[Fixed Issues]
Fixed an issue that caused image file display errors.

[Enhancements]
- Removed external links.

[Fixed Issues]
- Fixed some minor login issues.

[Enhancements]
Improved the Contact Support section of the user interface.

[Fixed Issues]
Fixed an issue where some information related to iOS 13 cannot be displayed correctly. 
Fixed an issue where DDNS information is not displayed correctly.

[Fixed Issues]

- Fixed some minor issues.

[Fixed Issues]
Fixed some minor issues.

[Fixed Issues]
- Fixed some minor issues.

[Fixed Issues]
Fixed some minor issues.

[Fixed Issues]
Fixed an issue Qphoto display empty page.
Fixed some minor issues.

[Security Updates] 
Updated 3rd-party component to the latest version. 

[Enhancements] 
Added the Service Agreement screen. Users must now accept the Service Agreements before using the software.
Fixed some minor issues
